configuration.zhanzhi_pp_zy: update zy_copy_test01 t set t.zhanzhi_name = ?,t.zy_id='光网OLT' where t.to_dev_name like ? and t.to_dev_spec like '%OLT%'
configuration.insertSqlPP: update zy_copy_test01 t set t.zy_pp = ? where t.id = ?
configuration.getIndex: select t.zc_index from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ? group by t.zc_index
configuration.getSqlZCOne: select t.ANLN1 from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_index = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ? and zc_id = ?
configuration.getSqlZYOne: select t.id from zy_copy_test01 t where t.zy_index = ? and t.zhanzhi_name =? and t.zy_id = ?
configuration.selectIndex1st: select t.zc_index from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ? and t.zc_index_2nd is null group by t.zc_index
configuration.selectIndex2nd: select t.zc_index,t.zc_index_2nd from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ? and t.zc_index_2nd is not null group by t.zc_index,t.zc_index_2nd
configuration.selectSqlZC2nd: select t.ANLN1 from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_index = ? and t.zc_index_2nd = ? and t.zc_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ?
configuration.selectSqlZY2nd: select t.id from zy_copy_test01 t where t.zy_index = ? and t.zy_index_2nd = ? and t.zy_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ? and t.is_match = 1
configuration.selectSqlZC1st: select t.ANLN1 from zc_copy_test01 t where t.zc_index = ? and t.zc_index_2nd is null and zc_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ?
configuration.selectSqlZY1st: select t.id from zy_copy_test01 t where t.zy_index = ? and t.zy_pp is null and t.zy_id = ? and t.zhanzhi_name = ?
